data.name: Queries_CreateMagic1New
data.value: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[MAGIC_TYPE1_NEW]( [iNum] [int] NOT NULL, [Name] [char](100) NULL, [Description] [char](200) NULL, [Type] [tinyint] NOT NULL, [HitRate] [smallint] NOT NULL, [Hit] [smallint] NOT NULL, [AddDamage] [smallint] NOT NULL, [Delay] [tinyint] NOT NULL, [ComboType] [tinyint] NOT NULL, [ComboCount] [tinyint] NOT NULL, [ComboDamage] [smallint] NOT NULL, [Range] [smallint] NOT NULL ) ON [PRIMARY]

data.name: Queries_CreateMagicNew

data.name: Queries_DropAllNew
data.value: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'[dbo].[MAGIC_NEW]') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsUserTable') = 1) DROP TABLE [dbo].[MAGIC_NEW] IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'[dbo].[MAGIC_TYPE1_NEW]') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsUserTable') = 1) DROP TABLE [dbo].[MAGIC_TYPE1_NEW] IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'[dbo].[MAGIC_TYPE2_NEW]') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsUserTable') = 1) DROP TABLE [dbo].[MAGIC_TYPE2_NEW] IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'[dbo].[MAGIC_TYPE3_NEW]') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsUserTable') = 1) DROP TABLE [dbo].[MAGIC_TYPE3_NEW] IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'[dbo].[MAGIC_TYPE4_NEW]') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsUserTable') = 1) DROP TABLE [dbo].[MAGIC_TYPE4_NEW] IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'[dbo].[MAGIC_TYPE5_NEW]') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsUserTable') = 1) DROP TABLE [dbo].[MAGIC_TYPE5_NEW] IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'[dbo].[MAGIC_TYPE6_NEW]') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsUserTable') = 1) DROP TABLE [dbo].[MAGIC_TYPE6_NEW] IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'[dbo].[MAGIC_TYPE9_NEW]') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsUserTable') = 1) DROP TABLE [dbo].[MAGIC_TYPE9_NEW]
